name: TooltipProps
description:
TooltipTrigger wraps around a trigger element and a Tooltip. It handles opening and closing
the Tooltip when the user hovers over or focuses the trigger, and positioning the Tooltip relative to the trigger.

isDisabled.description: Whether the tooltip should be disabled, independent from the trigger.

delay.description: The delay time for the tooltip to show up. [See guidelines](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/tooltip/#Immediate-or-delayed-appearance).

closeDelay.description: The delay time for the tooltip to close. [See guidelines](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/tooltip/#Warmup-and-cooldown).

trigger.description: By default, opens for both focus and hover. Can be made to open only for focus.

isOpen.description: Whether the overlay is open by default (controlled).

defaultOpen.description: Whether the overlay is open by default (uncontrolled).

onOpenChange.description: Handler that is called when the overlay's open state changes.

placement.description: The placement of the tooltip relative to the trigger.

isEntering.description: Whether the tooltip is currently entering. Use this to apply animations.

isExiting.description: Whether the tooltip is currently exiting. Use this to apply animations.
